definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: 27At that time they will see the Son of Man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
sentences.chinese: 那時，他們要看見人子有能力，有大榮耀駕雲降臨。

sentences.english: Wilt thou ride with me, some fine night, to see thy father?
sentences.chinese: 你願意在一個晚上和我一起駕雲上天去看你父親嗎？

sentences.english: So Yahweh is described like Baal, as riding on the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華被描述成像Baal一樣的，駕雲飛行。
